#nametype [nametype]: 111

summoned with #734 Summon Yetis (Conjuration 3)

The Yeti is a huge ape-like monster of the mountain glaciers. It sometimes attacks unwary travelers who try to cross the high mountain passes. Yetis are gifted with magical strength and are always surrounded by by icy winds.
